channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: House Flipper and Friends Bundle
item.content:encoded: Passionate about home renovations? Jump into the creative and crafty world of House Flipper with this value-packed game bundle! Get started with the core game then enhance your experience with a massive collection of add-ons and DLC, featuring The Tenants - Pets, Garden DLC, Train Yard Builder, and more. Pay what you want for the ultimate home improvement and renovation experience, and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase!

item.title: Deckbuilder Bonanza
item.content:encoded: Make your friends look silly in a friendly game of cards—but these aren’t just any card games. The Deckbuilder Bonanza Bundle offers players some of the best roguelike deck-building games around. Play hot titles like HELLCARD, Backpack Hero, and much more. These titles magically mix the familiarity of card games with roguelike progression elements to create unique and addicting video games. Mix up your game genres—and help support The ESA Foundation.

item.title: Pathfinder Kingmaker Bundle from Paizo Inc.
item.content:encoded: Gather your party of trusty friends for countless adventures with our latest Pathfinder bundle from Paizo Inc. Enhance your existing Pathfinder collection with new rulebooks, sourcebooks, and campaign resources. Highlights from the Pathfinder Kingmaker Bundle include Pathfinder: Kingmaker Enhanced Plus Edition and Pathfinder Kingmaker Companion Guide. Get everything you need to embark on an epic high fantasy journey together, and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

item.title: Capcom Arcade Classics & Fighters Pack
item.content:encoded:
Hit your friends with a punishing Shoryuken in our Capcom Arcade Classics & Fighters Pack. Dive into a robust collection of Street Fighter titles including Street Fighter V - Championship Edition and Street Fighter 30th Anniversary Collection, and fantastic arcade titles like Mega Man and Final Fight. Get hyped for tournament season, test your skills, and help support the Children's Miracle Network Hospitals with your purchase.

Games from the CAPCOM Arcade Stadium Complete Pack are collected into two total keys: one for CAPCOM Arcade Stadium and the second for CAPCOM Arcade 2nd Stadium.

item.title: Better With a Friend: Co-op Adventures
item.content:encoded: Get the snacks ready because we’re playing all night! The Better With a Friend Bundle features amazing co-op titles like Across the Obelisk, Risk of Rain Returns, Trine 4, and more! Snag great games, get the party started, and support the Michael J Fox Foundation with your purchase.

item.title: Destiny 2: The Story So Far 2025
item.description: Do you have the heart of a Guardian?
item.content:encoded:
The Destiny 2 Story So Far 2025 Bundle gives you access to the Light & Darkness Saga. Purchase the right tier for you to complete the chapters you may have missed, or live the adventure to its thrilling end!

*Customers must download the free edition of Destiny 2 on Steam in order to redeem the keys for expansion content.
